Sentencas: Biodiesel (alkyl ester of rapeseed oil) is prepared using various, methyl, ethyl and butyl alcohols through the transesterification process.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Sodium hydroxide and sulfuric acid are used as catalyst for methyl alcohol, ethyl alcohol and butyl alcohol respectively.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Biodiesel-water formulations are formulated using water and emulsifiers like sodium lauryl sulphate (SLS) and SPAN 80 in a high shear mixer.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The formulations are tested at 800 degrees C as fuel for internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The formulations based on methyl and butyl esters require the use of emulsifiers to prepare stable emulsions, while ethyl esters are able to form stable emulsions without emulsifiers.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The decrease in the biodiesel concentration of formulation does not have any effect on the power density of the ethyl ester formulation.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Fuel cells fuelled with 20% formulations lasted longer than 50% formulations in all the formulations tested as result of increase in steam carbon ratio resulting in effective removal of carbon deposited on the anode surface.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Butyl ester formulations exhibited the worst performance in both types of formulation tests.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The best performance was exhibited by 20% ethyl formulation in terms of life of the cell but 50% methyl ester formulations exhibit the highest power density.
Titulo: Biodiesel formulations as fuel for internally reforming solid oxide fuel cell
